Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Ground obstacles, add pits, double jump, Bluey characters, fix mobile landscape

- Fix obstacles floating above ground \(base Y 350→400 to sit on ground\)
- Add pit obstacles: gaps in ground that cost a life if fallen into
- Add double jump: second mid-air jump with slightly less power
- Fix key repeat burning both jumps instantly
- Add 6 new Bluey background characters \(Muffin, Socks, Mackenzie, Rusty, Judo, Chloe\)
- Add drawing code for all Bluey bg characters and creatures \(were invisible\)
- Fix mobile landscape black bars by stretching game container to 100vw

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add difficulty levels with quiz system on obstacle/pit hits

Adds Easy/Medium/Hard level selection after world pick. On Medium and
Hard, hitting an obstacle or falling into a pit triggers a quiz instead
of instant damage — correct answer avoids the hit and awards +100 pts,
wrong answer loses a life. Easy plays unchanged. Medium uses Hebrew
questions and labels; Hard uses English. Includes math and picture-
identification question types with 32 hand-drawn canvas illustrations.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
